com.axelor.studio.service

Class ViewCalculationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ViewCalculationService

  • public class ViewCalculationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class use to process ViewCalculation records to convert it to groovy expressions.
    Author:
    axelor

      • process

        public java.lang.String process(ViewEditor viewEditor,
                       java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.ActionRecord> actionRecords,
                       java.lang.String onSave)
        Method get ViewCalculation o2m from ViewEditor and create ActionRecords from it.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor to process.
        actionRecords - List of ActionRecords from parent view. List updated with new ActionRecords created.
        onSave - String of onSave actions of parent form view.
        Returns:
        Updated onSave string.

        Parameters:
